## Task Complete

**Task**: Add LSP configuration to g3-config (Phase 4 of LSP integration)
**Status**: Completed

**What was done**:
- Added `g3-lsp` as an optional dependency in Cargo.toml
- Created `lsp` feature flag that enables the g3-lsp dependency
- Added `LspServerConfigToml` struct for per-language server configuration (command, args, extensions, root_markers, env, timeout_ms, working_directory)
- Added `LspConfig` struct for main LSP section (enabled, auto_start, request_timeout_seconds, servers map)
- Added `lsp` field to main `Config` struct with `#[serde(default)]`
- Implemented helper methods on `LspConfig` (timeout_ms, get_server_config, has_server_config)
- Implemented helper method on `LspServerConfigToml` (effective_timeout_ms)
- Added feature-gated conversion methods to convert config to g3-lsp types (`to_lsp_config`, `to_lsp_server_configs`)
- Updated `Default` implementation for `Config` to include `lsp: LspConfig::default()`

**Files changed**:
- `/Users/savusilviu/Desktop/self-contained-system/g3/g3/crates/g3-config/Cargo.toml` - Added g3-lsp optional dependency and lsp feature
- `/Users/savusilviu/Desktop/self-contained-system/g3/g3/crates/g3-config/src/lib.rs` - Added LspConfig, LspServerConfigToml structs, helper methods, feature-gated conversions, updated Config struct

**Verification**: 
- `cargo check -p g3-config` - passes
- `cargo check -p g3-config --features lsp` - passes
- `cargo test -p g3-config` - 6 tests pass
- `cargo test -p g3-config --features lsp` - 6 tests pass</result>

- `/Users/savusilviu/Desktop/self-contained-system/g3/g3/crates/g3-core/src/tools/lsp.rs` - Created new LSP tools module (560+ lines)

- `/Users/savusilviu/Desktop/self-contained-system/g3/g3/crates/g3-core/src/tools/acd.rs` - Fixed test ToolContext initializations

**9 LSP Tools Added**:
| Tool | Description |
|------|-------------|
| `lsp_goto_definition` | Jump to symbol definition |
| `lsp_find_references` | Find all usages of a symbol |
| `lsp_hover` | Get type info/docs at position |
| `lsp_document_symbols` | List symbols in a file |
| `lsp_workspace_symbols` | Search workspace symbols |
| `lsp_goto_implementation` | Find trait/interface implementations |
| `lsp_call_hierarchy` | Get incoming/outgoing calls |
| `lsp_diagnostics` | Get compiler errors/warnings |
| `lsp_status` | Show active LSP servers |
